availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Leach (Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant. )

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant. Maryland native. Married to Altha Miller Leach in Ohio County, Kentucky, on May 4, 1819. Father of Martha Ann Leach Coleman, James Leach, Lizetta C. Leach Hocker, Asberry D. Leach, John M. Leach, and Nancy Leach Montague. Farmer in Ohio County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, District 1, p. 19A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Cromwell District, p. 682.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film 000494956.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Ohio County Wills, vol. D, 1862-1911, p. 10.
"Joseph Leach (1795-1864)," Find A Grave, Memorial 67825971, accessed November 4, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67825971.
